item.description:
Monthly Nashua video screening: A Noble Lie (about the Oklahoma City bombing)

We will meet at the front door of Balanced Health Center and plan a place to go for coffee. since BHC is busy this Tuesday night. We may go to the Starbuck's coffee shop at Exit 6 next to Kohl's unless someone comes up with a better suggestion, perhaps a pizza place. This month will only be a discussion then.

Thanks for your patience,

MV911T
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be outside the front door of Balanced Health Center and will make a plan from there.
item.name: Nashua - monthly video screening
